meanings.definition: A colorless, flammable liquid used as a solvent and in the production of pesticides and other chemicals.
meanings.sent1: The chlorobenzene was stored safely in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: Factories use chlorobenzene to make various products.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled chlorobenzene on his lab coat.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemicals, chlorobenzene is like a versatile artist, blending into different mixtures.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of chlorobenzene lingered in the air, reminding everyone of its presence.
